content.p: The School of Education provides an exciting and rewarding learning experience with a global view. We aim to inspire our students to inspire others. Because we believe that education can improve the lives and opportunities of individuals and communities, we champion the study and improvement of education for all. Our vision is to build upon our local, national and international reputation for the highest quality scholarship, research and teaching in the field of education. There are no results that match your criteria. telephone: +6 (03) 8725 3717 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8020
